faq.question: How accurate is Pine Script conversion for Osu traders?
faq.answer: We guarantee 98%+ signal accuracy through meticulous manual conversion. Unlike automated tools, our developers ensure your MT4/MT5 EA matches TradingView signals exactly, validated across instruments popular with Ghanaian and international traders.

faq.question: Can you convert all Pine Script versions?
faq.answer: Yes! We support all Pine Script versions from v3 to the latest v6. Our team stays current with TradingView's syntax updates and best practices used globally.

faq.question: Do I get both MT4 and MT5 versions?
faq.answer: You can choose MT4 only, MT5 only, or both platforms. Dual conversion is available at a discounted rate, maximizing your broker flexibility.

faq.question: What if my strategy uses custom Pine Script indicators?
faq.answer: If you have the Pine Script code, we convert everything. For proprietary indicators without source code, we create equivalent MQL implementations matching the original functionality.

faq.question: How does the conversion process work for Osu clients?
faq.answer: We offer remote consultation via video call, email, or in-person meetings in Osu if preferred. All communication is professional, timely, and designed around your schedule and trading needs.

faq.question: Will the MT4/MT5 EA perform exactly like TradingView?
faq.answer: Yes! We replicate all entry/exit logic, indicator calculations, alerts, and position management. Your EA will generate identical signals to your TradingView strategy across all market conditions.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept in Ghana?
faq.answer: We accept international bank transfer, PayPal, cryptocurrency (USDT, BTC), and can arrange local Ghanaian payment for Osu-based clients. Flexible installment plans available.
